Package player

Class Player

java.lang.Object
player.Hand
player.Player
public class Player
extends player.Hand
Player Class represents a player. A player can be seen as a hand with additional information regarding only the player: the current credit, the initial credit, the total amount bet, the total amount received in the end and the statistics
Author:
Miguel Carvalho, Filipe Ferraz, Joao Baptista

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player​(int credit)
      Constructor to initialize player object. Creates a player with initial credit and with empty list of cards.
      Parameters:
      credit - Initial credit of the player.

  • Method Details

    • getThrownOutCards

      public Card[] getThrownOutCards()
      This method returns all cards added to the thrown out pile.
      Returns:
      Array with all cards of the thrown out pile.

    • removeCardFromThrownOut

      private void removeCardFromThrownOut​(Card c)
      This method removes a specific card from the thrown out pile.
      Parameters:
      c - Card that is being removed from the thrown out pile.

    • addThrownOutCardsToDeck

      private void addThrownOutCardsToDeck​(Deck d)
      This method removes all cards from thrown out pile and adds them to the end of the deck.
      Parameters:
      d - Deck where the cards are being added.

    • addHandCardsToDeck

      public void addHandCardsToDeck​(Deck d)
      This method add all the hand cards to the end of the deck after a play.
      Parameters:
      d - Deck where the cards are being added.

    • getCredit

      public int getCredit()
      This method returns the player credit at a specific moment.
      Returns:
      Credit of the player at a specific moment.

    • setCredit

      public void setCredit​(int credit)
      This method sets the player credit to a specific amount.
      Parameters:
      credit - Amount set to the player credit.

    • getLastBetAmount

      public int getLastBetAmount()
      This method returns the amount placed in the last bet. Only called when a bet already occurred previously.
      Returns:
      amount placed in the last bet (1,2,3,4,5).

    • setLastBetAmount

      public void setLastBetAmount​(int amount)
      This method sets the last bet amount placed. Called everytime a new valid bet occurs.
      Parameters:
      amount - Amount placed in the last bet.

    • getHasBetBefore

      public boolean getHasBetBefore()
      This method returns either true or false depending on if at a specific moment, a bet already occurred or not.
      Returns:
      boolean true/false depending on the outcome

    • setHasBetBefore

      public void setHasBetBefore​(boolean b)
      This method sets either true or false depending on if a bet already occurred or not. Everytime a valid bet occurs, boolean is set to true.
      Parameters:
      b - boolean set to true/false depending on the situation.

    • getInitialCredit

      public int getInitialCredit()
      This method returns the initial credit of the player.
      Returns:
      Initial credit of the player.

    • getStatistics

      public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer> getStatistics()
      This method returns the statistics of awarded (or not) hands hit until now.
      Returns:
      List of hands and number of hits of each one until now.

    • initializeStatistics

      private void initializeStatistics()
      This method initializes the statistics of the player. Called once at the beginning.

    • addOneToStatistics

      public void addOneToStatistics​(java.lang.String s)
      This method adds a hit to a specific hand on the player statistics
      Parameters:
      s - Specific hand hitted

    • addToTotalBetAmount

      public void addToTotalBetAmount​(int newBetAmount)
      This method adds to the total bet amount of the player the current bet amount. Called everytime a valid bet occurred.
      Parameters:
      newBetAmount - The current bet amount.

    • getTotalAmountBet

      public int getTotalAmountBet()
      This method returns the total bet amount of the player.
      Returns:
      Total bet amount of the player.

    • getTotalAmountGained

      public int getTotalAmountGained()
      This method returns the total amount gained by the player (current credit - initial credit).
      Returns:
      Total amount gained.
